tag: html body text title span span
content: Back to the Fifties Jukebox. 200+ Fifties Classics in Real Audio. Our Award Winning Page! Don't miss it!

tag: html body text center p font i b span
content: Presents:

tag: html body text center p font font b font font font font font font font span
content: The Back to the "Fifties" Jukebox

tag: html body text center p span
content: Now 200+ Fifties Classics in Streaming Real Audio

tag: html body text center p font span
content: We think these are the Best of the best!

tag: html body text center p font b span
content: For Web Sites designed and maintained entirely by Seniors

tag: html body text center p font b span
content: Awarded February 2006.

tag: html body text p font i b span
content: This is the page which has been publicised in a number of Magazines and Newsletters, and is largely responsible for winning us the above awards! We think it is fairly unique.

tag: html body text p font i b span
content: You may spend Hours on this Page listening to some of the best Fifties Music on the Web, so bookmark it now, so you may return. If you enjoy it, please pass it along!

tag: html body text center p font span
content: Notice!

tag: html body text p font span
content: I have made some major changes to all "Jukebox " pages. This is the result of a growing number of EMails saying various "Jukebox" pages not working.

tag: html body text p font span
content: Jukebox pages can accomodate only one user at a time, and users remain on the page until selections have played. The rapidly growing number of hits on jukebox pages coupled with the time factor is causing problems.

tag: html body text p font span
content: To alleviate this congestion, I have added an "Alternate" page for all jukeboxes.

tag: html body text p font span
content: If songs are not loading or playing

tag: html body text p font b span
content: Click the Button Below

tag: html body text p font span
content: to enter an "Alternate identical page.

tag: html body text p font span
content: Also, remember the Jukebox pages do not work with the Realone Player. The solution for this problem is on the Fifties Menu page. If you are using the Realone Player please check it out also.

tag: html body text center p font span
content: Cllick for Alternate page.

tag: html body text center p font b span
content: Play your

tag: html body text center p font i b span
content: individual selections

tag: html body text center p font b span
content: in Streaming Real Audio!

tag: html body text center p font b span
content: Just like a real Jukebox. (Except it doesn't eat Quarters!)

tag: html body text p font b span
content: To make Selections, press and hold down the Control Key (Ctrl). Click each selection you wish to play, or to select all, press and hold down the shift key, click the top file, scroll down, and click the bottom file. When you finish making your Selections, release the Control Key or shift key, and Click on "Play These". MAC users, try the Command (Apple) key or the Shift key! We are receiving conflicting reports on MAC!

tag: html body text center p font b span
content: Important!

tag: html body text p font span
content: To make multiple selections press and hold down the Control key while clicking on your selections.
